Package com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core

The core classes that implement the cinch binding framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BindableModel A model that can have bindings applied to it.
Binding Interface for Binding objects.
BindingWiring  
ModelUpdate A marker interface to designate that an Enum is intended to be used as a model update specifier.
WiringHarness<T extends Annotation,W>  
 

Class Summary
BindingContext A BindingContext holds information about how to bind various parts of a Java Object.
Bindings All Bindings are called when ModelUpdates.ALL is called.
CallOnUpdate.Wiring  
DefaultBindableModel  
NopBindableModel A BindableModel implementation which does nothing.
ObjectFieldMethod A simple tuple of an object, a field on that object's class, and a method of that object's class.
SimpleBinding An implementation of Binding that hides the complicated method signature required of that interface.
WeakBindableModel Superclass for BindableModel instances, this class handles the binding tasks for subclassed models.
WeakBindableModelSupport A stand-alone implementation of BindableModel.
 

Enum Summary
ModelUpdates Pre-defined ModelUpdate types with special meanings to the framework.
 

Exception Summary
BindingException A runtime exception for when a binding fails to bind or fails to perform.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Bindable Marks the annotated field or type as bindable.
CallOnUpdate An annotation to mark that a method should be called when the bound model updates in a specific way.
NotBindable Marks the annotated field as not bindable.
 

Package com.palantir.ptoss.cinch.core Description

The core classes that implement the cinch binding framework.
